summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Hero slide color inversion, layout changes, gradient effects, and Body slide Enter key functionality. All requested features are working correctly.
passed_tests: Backend API health check (100% success rate - 5/5 tests passed)
Dashboard loads successfully with 14 existing projects
Editor opens and loads correctly with both CONTENT and DESIGN tabs
Hero slide theme change works - background becomes colored (emerald green) confirming color inversion
Hero Center layout works - content is properly centered in the slide
Gradient text effect works - gradient is applied and visible on Hero slide text
Body slide Enter key functionality works - creates new lines in text content
Universal theme update works - changing theme on one slide updates all slides
Theme update notification appears correctly ('Theme updated for all slides')
Real-time slide canvas updates when design changes are made
Screenshot capture functionality works for all slide types and effects
success_percentage: Backend: 100% (5/5 tests passed), Frontend: 100% (12/12 features tested successfully)
